_comment: keys that start with capital letter are usually set by the program, so its better to set them to empty string or null before your first run

google_search._comment: This is for the google search API. You can get your own key from https://developers.google.com/custom-search/v1/overview and search engine id from https://cse.google.com/cse/all

meteosource._comment: This is for the weather API. You can get your own key from https://www.meteosource.com/

url_shortner._comment: This is for the URL shortner API. You can get your own key from https://tinyurl.com/app/settings/api

theguardian._comment: This is for the news API. You can get your own key from https://open-platform.theguardian.com/

pastebin._comment: This is for the pastebin API. You can get your own key from https://pastebin.com/doc_api
